attributes.action: save Bollington St Johns Primary school from closure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cheshire county council have recommended the closure of Bollinton St Johns without any real rational. This petition is to give hope to children, staff and parents in this 'David vs Goliath' battle

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "save Bollington St Johns Primary school from closure."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15710.asp

Prime Minister's Office
